title: LG Dishwasher Roller with Axle
description: LG Dishwasher Roller with Axle ★★★★★ ★★★★★ 10 Reviews PartSelect Number PS3523050 Manufacturer Part Number 4581DD3002A The rack roller and axle in your dishwasher allows the dish rack to slide in and out effectively.If you notice that your dish rack is not performing this function, or if one or more of your rack rollers are damaged, you should consider replacing it. The roller attaches to the dish rack with the axle, both are included in this part. This part is gray in color, and measures 1 inch in diameter. With the axle, this part is approximately 1-1/2 inches wide. To access the rack roller and axle, you will need to remove the top dish rack from your dishwasher.
